marcus-aurelius.name: Marcus Aurelius
marcus-aurelius.bio: Marcus Aurelius was a Roman Emperor and Stoic philosopher, widely recognized for his profound insights into human nature and the practice of virtue.

epictetus.name: Epictetus
epictetus.bio: Epictetus was a former slave who rose to become a prominent Stoic philosopher, emphasizing the importance of personal freedom and self-control.

seneca.name: Seneca
seneca.bio: Seneca was a Roman Stoic philosopher, statesman, and dramatist, whose works profoundly influenced Stoic thought and literature.
